prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Pipe, Guitar, Drums, Piano, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Piano, Guitar, Synth Pad, Pipe, and Drums, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Guitar, Synth Pad, Pipe, and Drums, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Piano, Guitar, Synth Pad, Pipe, Drums - Bass is absent.
